revision.comment: not sure how to document such things
revision.text: These names correspond to potential functions that exist as far as [[ACC]] knows, but do not actually exist in any meaningful way. Some of these may correspond to [[Skulltag]] features extirpated long ago, others might be the abandoned foundations on which planned features were going to be built. In any case, none of them should be used. * GetFromIni * GrabInput * MoveMousePointer * PlayerBlueCard * PlayerBlueSkull * PlayerExpert * PlayerOnTeam * PlayerRedCard * PlayerRedSkull * PlayerYellowCard * PlayerYellowSkull * SetMousePointer * SetStyle * WriteToIni [[Category:ACS]]
